input.sentences: [male] sang his rendition of [female] the beautiful .
everyone in the audience joined in to express their patriotism .
[male] asks the audience what they want to hear .
he jumped for joy during the performance .
output.sentences: Jock rock is mostly guys badly playing and singing team anthems.
They join in songs that express their team patriotism.
The audience hearing this is always all male.
The more they drink the more gusto in their playing.
Gusto leads them to fits of joy and jumping over things.
